files.patch:
@@ -440,1 +440,1 @@
-    case REF_OTHER:
+    case REF_REFERENCE:
@@ -843,2 +843,2 @@
-    case REF_OTHER:
-      // Unknown reference type, impossible
+    case REF_REFERENCE:
+      // abstract j.l.r.Reference type, impossible

@@ -40,1 +40,1 @@
-  static const int number_of_subclasses_of_ref = REF_PHANTOM - REF_OTHER; // 5 - 1 = 4
+  static const int number_of_subclasses_of_ref = REF_PHANTOM - REF_REFERENCE; // 5 - 1 = 4

@@ -34,1 +34,1 @@
-  REF_OTHER,     // Subclass of java/lang/ref/Reference, but not subclass of one of the classes below
+  REF_REFERENCE, // java/lang/ref/Reference, super class of the following

@@ -31,1 +31,1 @@
-  REF_OTHER ("Other reference"),     // Subclass of java/lang/ref/Reference, but not subclass of one of the classes below
+  REF_REFERENCE ("j.l.r.Reference"), // java/lang/ref/Reference, super class of the following
